casebody.data:
CARILLON
v.
NCDHHS, et al. No. 54A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2007. Melissa L. Trippe, Mark A. Davis, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Thomas M. Woodward, Susan K. Hackney, Assistant Attorney Generals, for NCDHHS. Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Forrest W. Campbell, Jr., Greensboro, Charles F. Marshall, III, Raleigh, for Carillon Assistant Living. Susan M. Fradenburg, Allyson Jones Labban, Greensboro, for Ridge Care, Inc. Colin R. Stockton, for MedCath Diagnostics, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 4th day of January 2007 to Dismiss Appeal Based Upon Settlement by the Parties:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of January 2007."
